name: Music of the Spheres (itch) (akita_engineer)
description:
Music of the SpheresDescription

You are playing as lonely astronaut in space who has been tasked with the impossible: to bring the music back to the vacuum! Strategically crumble coming meteorites with the power of music and do your best to stay alive longer!

How to play
  • W, A, S, D to break coming obstacles
    • Note that key combinations like WA, SD, etc., won't work (this is on purpose)
  • Game ends when you miss too many obstacles
Development team
  • akita_engineer - programming, design, art
  • Peter Wojtek - audio
Tools
  • Unity Engine - game engine
  • FMOD - audio middleware
  • DALLE2 - pixel art generator
  • Music was produced by Peter Wojtek
  • Space background: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/dynamic-space-background-lite-104606
  • Keyboard icons: https://gerald-burke.itch.io/geralds-keys
  • The rest of the art has been generated using DALLE2: https://openai.com/dall-e-2/
